description: This table contains the Accident part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date (calendar format) on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: NON_WORK_ACC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the illness or injury is the result of a non-work-related accident. Y indicates that the illness or injury is the result of a non-work-related accident. N indicates that the illness or injury is not the result of a non-work-related accident. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ACCDNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The accident type category ID for the MSPQ.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Work


Home


Auto


Other

columns.name: ACCDNT_DATE
columns.description: The accident date for the MSPQ.

columns.name: ACCDNT_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The accident location category ID for the MSPQ.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Home


Office


OTHER

columns.name: ACCDNT_NON_LIAB_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether non-liability insurance is available. Y indicates that there is non-liability insurance available. N indicates that there is not non-liability insurance available. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: INSURED_NAME
columns.description: Name of the non-liability insurance holder.

columns.name: INSUR_COMPANY
columns.description: Name of the non-liability insurance company.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_POLICY
columns.description: Non-liability insurance policy number.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_CLAIM
columns.description: Non-liability insurance claim number.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_INS_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of the non-liability insurance company's address.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_INS_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the non-liability insurance company's address.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_INS_CITY
columns.description: Non-liability insurance company's city.

columns.name: N_LIAB_INS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the non-liability insurance company's state.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NON_LIAB_INS_ZIP
columns.description: Non-liability insurance company's zip code.

columns.name: THRD_PRTY_LIAB_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a third party is liable for this accident. Y indicates that a third party is liable for this accident. N indicates that a third party is not liable for this accident. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ATTRNY_USD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient has an attorney for this injury. Y indicates that the patient has an attorney for this injury. N indicates that the patient does not have an attorney for this injury. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ACCDNT_LIAB_NAME
columns.description: Name of the party responsible for the accident.

columns.name: ACCDNT_ATTRNY_NAME
columns.description: Name of the patient's attorney or the responsible party's attorney.

columns.name: LIABILITY_POLICY
columns.description: Liability insurance policy number.

columns.name: LIABILITY_CLAIM
columns.description: Liability claim number.

columns.name: LIABILITY_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of attorney or insurance company's address.

columns.name: LIABILITY_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of attorney or insurance company's address.

columns.name: LIABILITY_CITY
columns.description: Attorney or insurance company's city.

columns.name: LIABILITY_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Attorney or accident liability insurance company's state.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: N_LIAB_INS_STATE_C_NAME

columns.name: LIABILITY_ZIP
columns.description: Attorney or insurance company's ZIP Code.

columns.name: ATTRNY_PHONE
columns.description: Attorney or insurance company's telephone number.

columns.name: HAS_ADDL_LIAB_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient has additional liability insurers. Y indicates that the patient has additional liability insurers. N indicates that the patient does not have additional liability insurers. A null value indicates this item was not filled out. The additional information will be stored in table PAT_ENC_MSP_ADL_LB.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: HAS_ADDL_NLIAB_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient has additional non-liability insurers. Y indicates that the patient has additional non-liability insurers. N indicates that the patient does not have additional non-liability insurers. A null value indicates this item was not filled out. The additional information will be stored in table PAT_ENC_MSP_ADL_NL.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAS_ADDL_LIAB_YN

columns.name: NON_LIAB_SUB_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of the non-liability insurance subscriber's address.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_SUB_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the non-liability insurance subscriber's address.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_SUB_CITY
columns.description: Non-liability insurance subscriber's city.

columns.name: NON_LIAB_SUB_ZIP
columns.description: Non-liability insurance subscriber's zip code.

columns.name: RESP_PARTY_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of the responsible party's address.

columns.name: RESP_PARTY_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the responsible party's address.

columns.name: RESP_PARTY_CITY
columns.description: Responsible party's city.

columns.name: RESP_PARTY_ZIP
columns.description: Responsible party's zip code.
